meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of eight.
meanings.sent1: The octaval shape of the stop sign is easy to recognize.
meanings.sent2: The octaval group consisted of eight friends who always played together.
meanings.sent3: The octaval puzzle was challenging but fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: The octaval pattern on the rug created a sense of symmetry in the room.
meanings.sent5: The octaval arrangement of the chairs made the room feel balanced and spacious.

meanings.sent1: The next octaval celebration will be in 2028.
meanings.sent2: The octaval reunion brought together friends who hadn't seen each other in eight years.
meanings.sent3: Planning an octaval event requires careful scheduling and preparation.
meanings.sent4: The octaval festival was a rare and special occasion for the town.
meanings.sent5: The octaval tradition of planting new trees symbolized growth and renewal.

meanings.definition: A musical interval of an octave.
meanings.sent1: The singer's voice hit the octaval note perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The octaval in the song added depth and richness to the melody.
meanings.sent3: The octaval played by the pianist resonated throughout the concert hall.
meanings.sent4: The octaval between the two instruments created a harmonious blend of sound.
meanings.sent5: The octaval in the music score gave the piece a sense of completeness and fullness.
